Multiversal Mechatronics proudly presents it\'s first product to the public: The Sample Collector - Kerbal Edition

Collector installed on testing craft

First collection tests

OK, I\'m not a modeler, I\'m a programmer, so don\'t pay attention to how ugly it is

I\'ve decided to try to model something to test how it works for the projects I have in mind with the new plug-in system from 0.14, and I\'ve had this ridiculous kerbal idea of using an scoop to do sample return missions ???

If someone actually find this useful (for role-playing purposes or whatever), I might make it actually fill up with something after touching the ground when 0.14 comes out.

Nice idea!

When we get animation support, I guess you could do animated robotic hand with a scoop and a broom to collect samples.
